tool_description: Validates and cleanses incoming lead data to ensure data quality and completeness before processing through qualification workflows.

lead_data.description: Array of lead record strings in JSON format

required_fields.description: List of mandatory field names that must be present

validation_level.description: Validation strictness: basic, standard, or strict

error_messages: Invalid lead data format: Ensure lead_data contains valid JSON strings with consistent field structure.
Missing required fields: One or more leads are missing fields specified in required_fields array.
Invalid validation level: Use one of [basic, standard, strict].
Data size limit exceeded: Maximum 1000 lead records can be processed at once.
usage: Provide lead_data as JSON strings and required_fields array. Set validation_level for appropriate strictness. Tool returns validation results and cleaned data.

valid_leads.description: Array of validated lead records as JSON strings

invalid_leads.description: Array of invalid lead records with error details

validation_summary.description: Summary of validation results and data quality metrics
